alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen; Norman; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 3:55PM CDT until May 30 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rindal, or 41 miles south of Thief River Falls, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McIntosh, Erskine, Winger, Bejou, Rindal and Ranum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
